nodes.title: Sector Control Runtime Tree
nodes.excerpt: Sector-strobed Casimir runtime planning, guardrails, Helix Ask routing, and live UI bindings.
nodes.bodyMD:
Root map for sector-control planning, tree/DAG interpretation, and live surface rendering.

Minimal artifact: planner + preflight + panel flow.
nodes.summary: Runtime map for sector-control planner, guardrails, and live event reflection.

nodes.title: Sector Control Planner Tooling
nodes.excerpt: Deterministic planner and tool contract for sector schedules.
nodes.bodyMD:
Planner core and tool schema live in server/control/sectorControlPlanner.ts, server/skills/physics.warp.sector-control.plan.ts, and shared/schema.ts.

Minimal artifact: deterministic sector plan contract.
nodes.summary: Planner and tool contract for deterministic sector-control plans.

nodes.title: Mode Preflight And Fallback
nodes.excerpt: Operational mode switches run sector-control preflight and fail closed.
nodes.bodyMD:
Mode transitions run sector preflight and fallback ordering in server/control/sectorControlPreflight.ts and server/helix-core.ts.

Minimal artifact: first-fail + fallback contract.
nodes.summary: Guardrail preflight for mode transitions with deterministic fallback.

nodes.title: Helix Ask Tree DAG Routing
nodes.excerpt: Tree/DAG graph resolver path for sector-control interpretation.
nodes.bodyMD:
Graph routing for sector-control interpretation is configured through configs/graph-resolvers.json and resolved in server/services/helix-ask/graph-resolver.ts.

Minimal artifact: resolver scaffold and selected tree IDs.
nodes.summary: Resolver lane that maps sector-control prompts into tree/DAG scaffolds.

nodes.title: Time Dilation Live Events
nodes.excerpt: Mode preflight sector-control events reflected live in Time Dilation panel telemetry.
nodes.bodyMD:
Live event publication and panel reflection are implemented in client/src/hooks/use-energy-pipeline.ts and client/src/components/TimeDilationLatticePanel.tsx.

Minimal artifact: live event panel telemetry block.
nodes.summary: Live event rendering of sector-control preflight and reload activity.

nodes.title: Sector Control Reproducibility Lane
nodes.excerpt: Deterministic batch generation for scientific replay and prompt packs.
nodes.bodyMD:
Reproducibility runner emits deterministic mode batches and prompt markdown using scripts/sector-control-repro.ts.

Minimal artifact: reproducibility summary hash and prompt batch markdown.
nodes.summary: Deterministic replay lane for sector-control plans and prompt batches.

nodes.title: Planner To Time Dilation Bridge
nodes.excerpt: Bridge linking planner outputs to live Time Dilation panel interpretation.
nodes.bodyMD:
Cross-reference between planner output semantics and panel live events.

Minimal artifact: event payload -> panel telemetry mapping.

bridge.relation: Planner preflight payload is published as live event telemetry in the Time Dilation panel.

nodes.summary: Bridge linking sector planner outputs to live UI events.
